resources.string: L2 - Moderate (41 - 80): People with respiratory illnesses may experience symptoms such as a dry cough and tiredness.

L3 - Bad (81 - 120): People with respiratory or heart diseases, the elderly and children have worsened symptoms. The general population may experience symptoms such as burning eyes, nose and throat, dry cough and tiredness.
L4 - Very Bad (121 - 200): Increased symptoms in children and people with lung and cardiovascular diseases. Increase in respiratory symptoms in the general population.
L5 - Terrible (>200): Worsening of respiratory symptoms. Worsening of lung diseases, such as asthma, and cardiovascular diseases, such as myocardial infarction.
